QueryText: Regarding control of Apple Mosaic Virus
Regarding control of  apple Mosaic Virus

KccAns: FOLLOWING PRECAUTIONS TO BE TAKEN IN APPLE ORCHARD FOR APPLE MOSAIC VIRUS:1PRUNED THE INFECTED TWIGS 2 DISINFECT THE PRUNING TOOLS BEFORE  ITS USE IN ANOTHER HEALTHY TREE3 FIELD SANITATION SHOULD BE THERE4 TAGGING OF INFECTED BRANCHES SHOULD BE DONE AT THIS STAGE TO IDENTIFY THE INFECTED PORTION IN OFF SEASON

QueryText: REGARDING THE APPLE MOSAIC VIRUS  IN APPLE ORCHARD
KccAns: FOR APPLE MOSAIC VIRUS DISINFESTATION OF TOOLS  NEEDS TO BE DONE BEFORE PRUNING OF HEALTHY TREE USE VIRUS FREE MATERIAL AS A GRAFT AND IT SHOULD BE OBTAINED FROM A REGISTERED NURSERY PUNNED OFF THE INFECTED TWIGS IF THE YELLOWING OF LEAVES BECOMES SEVERE

THE FARMER WAS ADVISED THAT TO TAKE through preventative measures and avoid planting contaminated material Since these viruses cannot be directly removed from the plant itself the most practical technique to manage ApMV is to plant certified trees obtained from Plant Improvement Organizations

QueryText: REGARDING THE APPLE MOSAIC VIRUS IN APPLE ORCHARD
KccAns: IN THE OFF SEASON DURING PRUNING TIME IN APPLE ORCHARD DISINFESTATION  OF TOOLS AND  EQUIPMENT IS MUST PRUNED THE INFECTED TWIGS IF INFECTION IS MORE SEVERE AT THIS TIME
Dr Mrs Shalini Verma ScientistDepartment of Plant Pathology Fruit Pathology UHF Nauni 01792-2521400 98162-50009

QueryText: regarding attack of apple mosaic virus
KccAns: THE FARMER WAS ADVISED THAT THERE IS NO CURE FOR HIS VIRAL DISEASE BUT HE CAN DO THE FOLLOING TO CONTROL IT:Plant virus-free varieties use virus-free grafting scion wood Diseased trees should be marked not need to be removed but should not be used as a source for scion material Feed nutrients at regular intervals Keep orchards insects free Neem Oils is a good source

QueryText: REGARDING APPLE MOSAIC VIRUS IN APPLE ORCHARDS
KccAns: THE FARMER WAS ADVISED TO TAG THE TWIGS AND PLANTS WHERE MOSAIC VIRUS IS FOUND THE PLANTS SHOULD BE PRUNNED WITH STERLIZED SCISSORS AND THE VIRUS INFECTED PLANTS SHOULD BE PRUNED AT THE ENDAND VIRUS FREE BUD WOOD SHOULD BE USED FOR GRAFTING
